query:
SELECT DISTINCT u."id" as "user_id"
        FROM "User" u
        INNER JOIN "UserInsights" ui ON u."id" = ui."userId"
        LEFT JOIN "UserInsightBatch" uib ON u."id" = uib."userId"
        WHERE 
            ui."generated" = true
            AND ui."createdAt" > COALESCE(uib."createdAt", '1970-01-01'::timestamptz)
        OR 
            uib."expiresAt" <= NOW()
        ORDER BY u."id"
        LIMIT $1
